title: List of all Android import  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android import  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: SQLiteImporterExporter
repoList.description: A light weight library for exporting and importing sqlite database in android

repoList.name: TabLayout
repoList.description: TabLayout extract from Android Design Library for who do not want to import Android Design Library .

repoList.name: CroPicker
repoList.description: CroPicker is album and image Picker Library for Android. Supports import a list of Albums and support multiple image selection.

repoList.name: SQLiteHelp
repoList.description: A library to easily integrate databases to the android applications and import and export data from and into database from the excel files.

repoList.name: ExpansionAPKsAndroidStudio
repoList.description: Android studio import of sampleDownloaderActivity, licensing, downloader library and zip file

repoList.name: LogView
repoList.description: A android logcat library based on Lynx,so you can show your Android logcat in a float view.but it’s different. I think it is more useful for hybrid app.Because it's very simple to import and don't need other jars.

repoList.name: ImportingNativeLibrary
repoList.description: Calling 3rd party native library from Android Studio, and build directly from the IDE

repoList.name: android-library-demo
repoList.description: Import Android library into another app

repoList.name: android.lib.ll.example
repoList.description: C++ library import example

repoList.name: pictureimportlib
repoList.description: Android picture import library
